data.name: Instagram Full-res+Right-click+Removed-login
data.description:
Added full res images and enabled right click 

you can find skin that removes login requirement in profiles here:
https://userstyles.org/styles/183329/instagram-removed-login-requirement
but with a recent change you can only open pictures (without account) with the middle mouse button

in stories right click is accessible at the right edge of the video. https://userstyles.org/style_screenshots/164671_additional_35276.jpeg?r=1578231516

data.description: Don't you like the new Google logo? this is not a problem with this style you can return the Google logo from 2012!

data.name: Duolingo (blue header, not so bright, etc.)
data.description:
- blue header
- not so bright colors for the skill icons
- not so bright background (more of a greyish-white)
- streak checkmark in the header (Chrome/Chromium or other webkit browser is recommended)
- somewhat bigger fonts during the lessons
- other minor tweaks and changes
